General.Name: Harbin Hatou Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Harbin Hatou Investment Co.,Ltd produces and supplies heat and thermal power in the People's Republic of China. The company engages in the industrial and equity investment, and investment consulting; production and supply of electricity; and securities and futures brokerage businesses. It is also involved in securities underwriting and sponsorship, securities investment consulting, securities self-operation, securities asset management, margin financing and securities lending, securities investment fund agency sales, agency sales of financial products, etc. The company was formerly known as Harbin Sui Bao Re Dian Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Harbin Hatou Investment Co.,Ltd in November 2007. Harbin Hatou Investment Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Harbin, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Harbin Eco Innovation R&D Center Bldg, Harbin, China, 150028
